abstract: Riot erupts in Mahabad, Iran, over unexplained death of Kurdish chambermaid Farinaz Khosravani, who plunged from fourth-floor window of hotel Tara.
lead_paragraph: Angry over the death of a chambermaid threatened with rape, ethnic Kurds in Mahabad burned the hotel where she had worked, witnesses and reports said.

headline.main: Riot Erupts in Iran’s Kurdish Capital Over Woman’s Death
headline.print_headline: Kurdish City in Iran Erupts After Death of a Woman

snippet: Angry over the death of a chambermaid threatened with rape, ethnic Kurds in Mahabad burned the hotel where she had worked, witnesses and reports said.
